DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine efficacy once-daily rosuvastatin reduce LDL-C child adolescent age 10-17 year HeFH baseline ( Day 0 ) end 12-week double-blind treatment period .
DOC.criteria: Male female ( least 1 year postmenarche ) child adolescent ( age 10 17 year ) heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia ( HeFH ) Certain medical condition lab test result History reaction rosuvastatin statin drug Use specify disallowed medication
